participant_1.background: i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman.

participant_2.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i watch too much tv in spare time. i have never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i go to the gym most days just to socialize.

content.text: hello i just moved here from germany
i like to spend my money on cars.
